High Priest Orven:
Yes... I know you are brave and strong warrior, not a newbie. People from the places where you are famed for your heroic deeds have spread news about it.
You've achieved many victories but to get stronger you have to defeat more dangerous enemies in more dangerous places. I've mind one such place.
I'm talking about the Sea of Spores. That's a very good place to improve your skills and grow stronger.
You can get to the Sea of Spores using teleport in Oren. I suppose a mighty warrior such as you can survive in this horrible place.
